snippet: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. addressed reports that Yemeni explosives experts were working on devices small enough to fit into cellphones or laptop computers, and helping militants in Syria.
abstract: Atty Gen Eric H Holder Jr expresses 'extreme, extreme concern' over reports that bomb makers from Yemen responsible for 2009 underwear-bomb plot are now in Syria cooperating with foreign militants there; Holder seems to confirm reports that Yemeni bomb makers are working to design small explosive devices, without explicitly saying so.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. addressed reports that Yemeni explosives experts were working on devices small enough to fit into cellphones or laptop computers, and helping militants in Syria.

headline.main: Holder Voices ‘Extreme Concern’ About Terrorist Bomb Makers
headline.print_headline: Holder Voices ‘Extreme Concern’ About Terrorist Bomb Makers
